name: Auto-create test files
description: Automatically create corresponding test files when implementation files are created

action.prompt:
A new implementation file has been created at {{file_path}}. Please create a corresponding test file following these guidelines:

1. Create the test file in the same directory with .test.{ts,tsx} extension
2. Import the component/function being tested
3. Set up basic test structure with describe block
4. Include at least one basic rendering/functionality test
5. Use React Testing Library for component tests
6. Use Vitest for utility function tests
7. Follow the existing test patterns in the project

For components, test:
- Basic rendering without errors
- Props are handled correctly
- Key user interactions work

For utilities/services:
- Core functionality works as expected
- Error cases are handled
- Edge cases are covered

Keep tests focused and minimal - test behavior, not implementation details.
